name: Ticochet (TIC game)
description:
TicochetHow to play:

Use left and right arrow keys to move the paddle. Bounce off of walls and blocks for more points. The game gets faster the longer you play. You have three lives. Instructions are also in the game.

Changelog

Version 1.2:

Actually started using version numbers

Added Logo Intro

Screen color extended

Game doesn't start immediately

Cool rectangle effect on hits
